methods.name: glm::epsilonEqual
methods.parameters: const genType &x, const genType &y, const genType &epsilon
methods.short:
Returns the component-wise comparison of |x - y| < epsilon. True if this expression is satisfied.

See also: gtc_epsilon

Returns the component-wise comparison of |x - y| < epsilon. True if this expression is satisfied.

See also: gtc_epsilon

methods.name: glm::epsilonNotEqual
methods.parameters: const genType &x, const genType &y, const typename genType::value_type &epsilon
methods.short:
Returns the component-wise comparison of |x - y| < epsilon. True if this expression is not satisfied.

See also: gtc_epsilon

methods.name: glm::epsilonNotEqual
methods.parameters: const genType &x, const genType &y, const genType &epsilon

###bool glm::epsilonNotEqual(&x, &y, &epsilon)

<!-- syntax: glm::epsilonNotEqual(&x, &y, &epsilon) name: glm::epsilonNotEqual returns: bool _returns_description: _ parameters: const genType &x, const genType &y, const genType &epsilon version_started: 0.10.0 _version_deprecated: _ _summary: _ constant: False static: False visible: True advanced: False -->
